description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Use the alien bomb squad to stop the blue wheelers from reaching the mothership. “Neat art style - Good graphics - Very fun - Great price.” - Aaron W - Onpause.org
